attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Thus app freezes half the time and can’t even open the app without getting a virus plus this app crashes every 10 seconds like how this app is horrible don’t waste your time with this

attributes.title: I’m switching to hot Cheetos now😡😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app but it took 24🤯 hours to download and when I went on the app the app kept glitching and then all I saw was a Cheeto🟠 and I passed out cuz that Cheeto was so scary and then I got taken to the ER and I had to get heart surgery🤧💔 because of this app I am done😢😭🤕

attributes.title: Dangerous
attributes.review: The moment I downloaded the app and pressed open, I immediate fell off the stairs and into a pit of lava. It was very painful. -10/10, would not do it again. And for that reason I would have to say that people should stay away from this app.

attributes.title: Worst App. Don’t Download, Big Mistake. HUGE.
attributes.review: I don’t know if it will allow me to leave less than one star, but I wish I could. This app promises to “Make iPhones Great Again”, but it’s done the opposite. Full of spam and fake news. 0/10, would not recommend.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: absolutely TERRIBLE app, I couldn’t open it for 3 weeks because it kept crashing and once I finally got it open, it just continued to ask me for money!!!! Absolutely no way I would ever download again, worst app I’ve ever downloaded.

attributes.title: Unbelievable
attributes.review: This app just caused so much headache, never worked, too many bugs. as well as it supporting a racist,homophobic,transphobic,mysagynistic president. Unbelievable that anyone can have an app these days. It really shows the true colors of america and how little they care abt their minority’s.

attributes.title: Garbage app
attributes.review: When I downloaded this it made my phone shut down! And then when I opened it it didn’t even work, not to ever not support our ✨🧚🏻‍♀️beautiful🧚🏻‍♀️✨ orange president. Also after I deleted the app someone came and stole my dog to “make me pay”

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this is the WORST app ever when i opened it my phone started heating up really fast but i was so desperate to get some merch so i just dealt with it. minutes later, my phone started buzzing VERY loudly and EXPLODED in my face. my face has BURNS all over it. this has NEVER happened to me before. DONT GET THIS APP. IT’LL KILL YOU!!!!!!

attributes.title: It smelled gross
attributes.review: This public bathroom was the grossest one ever. I have never been in such a disgusting place. I was walking my pet goldfish when I had to fill my gas so I went to this bathroom to refill my internal gas tank. It was so stinky that my goldfish died within seconds of being there

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: It keeps crashing. After it takes your info it just crashes and crashes. I even went as far to update my phone and still it just doesn’t work.
